about_the_game: Motivate your players and fans with a devilish-looking cheerleader. This pack includes an exclusive cheerleader for customizing your teams.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood Bowl 3 features Fantasy Violence and Blood.

detailed_description: Motivate your players and fans with a devilish-looking cheerleader. This pack includes an exclusive cheerleader for customizing your teams.

name: Blood Bowl 3 - Exclusive cheerleader

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1 GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4 GB | AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
